languages.text: Дом Версериан предоставил сто своих родичей на службу Вольному Торговцу в качестве управляющих и чиновников.
House Werserian provided one hundred of their kin to the Rogue Trader's service as stewards and officials.
languages.original_text: Дом Версериан предоставил сто своих родичей на службу Вольному Торговцу в качестве управляющих и чиновников.

traits.locale_text: House Werserian provided one hundred of their kin to the Rogue Trader's service as stewards and officials.

languages.text: Das Haus Werserian hat einhundert der Seinen als Truchsesse und Beamte in die Dienste {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} überstellt.
languages.original_text: House Werserian provided one hundred of their kin to the Rogue Trader's service as stewards and officials.

traits.locale_text: Das Haus Werserian hat einhundert der Seinen als Truchsesse und Beamte in die Dienste {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} überstellt.

languages.text: 韦尔森家族提供了一百名家族成员为行商浪人服务，这些人负责担任管家与军官。
languages.original_text: House Werserian provided one hundred of their kin to the Rogue Trader's service as stewards and officials.

traits.locale_text: 韦尔森家族提供了一百名家族成员为行商浪人服务，这些人负责担任管家与军官。

languages.text: La casa Werserian ha proporcionado a cien de sus miembros como administradores y funcionarios al servicio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: House Werserian provided one hundred of their kin to the Rogue Trader's service as stewards and officials.

traits.locale_text: La casa Werserian ha proporcionado a cien de sus miembros como administradores y funcionarios al servicio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: ウェルザリアン家は、ローグトレーダーの執事や職員として、100人にも及ぶキンを輩出してきた。
languages.original_text: House Werserian provided one hundred of their kin to the Rogue Trader's service as stewards and officials.

traits.locale_text: ウェルザリアン家は、ローグトレーダーの執事や職員として、100人にも及ぶキンを輩出してきた。

languages.text: La maison Werserian a mis au service {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} une centaine d'intendants et d'employés.
languages.original_text: House Werserian provided one hundred of their kin to the Rogue Trader's service as stewards and officials.

traits.locale_text: La maison Werserian a mis au service {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} une centaine d'intendants et d'employés.

languages.text: Werserian Hanesi, yüz soydaşını idarecilik ve memuriyet vazifelerini yürütmeleri için Hür Tacir'in hizmetine verdi.
languages.original_text: House Werserian provided one hundred of their kin to the Rogue Trader's service as stewards and officials.
